titles: The Patentee, or, Some reflections in verse on Mr. R---'s forgetting the design of His Majesty's bear-garden at Hockly in the Hole and letting out the theatre in Dorset-Garden to the same use on the day which Mr. Dryden's obsequies were perform'd, and both play-houses forbore acting in honour to his memory.
notes: Place and date of publication taken from NUC pre-1956 imprints.
